mapper.update:
update oss_acceptance_odRegisterInfo
DeliveryNo = #{deliveryno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OilNo = #{oilno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Shift = #{shift,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BeginTime = #{begintime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
EndTime = #{endtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
DischargeL = #{dischargel,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
BeginOilHeight = #{beginoilheight,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
BeginOilL = #{beginoill,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
BeginV20L = #{beginv20l,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
BeginTemperature = #{begintemperature,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
EndOilHeight = #{endoilheight,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
EndOilL = #{endoill,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
EndV20L = #{endv20l,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
EndTemperature = #{endtemperature,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
CreateTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
IsDel = #{isdel,jdbcType=INTEGER},
EnterType = #{entertype,jdbcType=INTEGER},
DuringSales = #{duringsales,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
TranStatus = #{transtatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
StableBeginTime = #{stablebegintime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
StableEndTime = #{stableendtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ForceCancelStable = #{forcecancelstable,jdbcType=INTEGER},
IsBeforeStable = #{isbeforestable,jdbcType=INTEGER},
BeginWaterHeight = #{beginwaterheight,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
EndWaterHeight = #{endwaterheight,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
where ManualNo = #{manualNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and OilCan = #{oilcan,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update oss_acceptance_odRegisterInfo set OilNo = #{oilno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DeliveryNo = #{deliveryno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Shift = #{shift,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BeginTime = #{begintime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, EndTime = #{endtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, DischargeL = #{dischargel,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, BeginOilHeight = #{beginoilheight,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, BeginOilL = #{beginoill,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, BeginV20L = #{beginv20l,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, BeginTemperature = #{begintemperature,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, EndOilHeight = #{endoilheight,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, EndOilL = #{endoill,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, EndV20L = #{endv20l,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, EndTemperature = #{endtemperature,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, CreateTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, IsDel = #{isdel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, EnterType = #{entertype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, DuringSales = #{duringsales,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, TranStatus = #{transtatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, StableBeginTime = #{stablebegintime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, StableEndTime = #{stableendtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, BeginWaterHeight = #{beginwaterheight,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, EndWaterHeight = #{endwaterheight,jdbcType=DOUBLE} where ManualNo = #{manualNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and OilCan = #{oilcan,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT FROM oss_acceptance_odRegisterInfo where ManualNo= #{manualno} ORDER BY BeginTime asc LIMIT 1
SELECT FROM oss_acceptance_odRegisterInfo where ManualNo= #{manualno} ORDER BY EndTime DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT OilNo as oilno,SUM(IFNULL(DischargeL, 0)) as dischargel FROM oss_acceptance_odRegisterInfo WHERE (Shift IS NULL OR Shift='' OR Shift >#{shift,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) AND DischargeL IS NOT NULL GROUP BY OilNo
SELECT FROM oss_acceptance_odRegisterInfo where OilCan=#{canno,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND BeginTime >=#{sttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}AND EndTime>=#{ettime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
SELECT info.* FROM (SELECT * FROM oss_acceptance_odRegister WHERE BeginTime IS NOT NULL AND endtime IS NULL )a INNER JOIN oss_acceptance_odRegisterInfo info ON a.ManualNO=info.ManualNo
